clearplot
hold on
t = 0:0.01:20;
y = -8 * exp(-t) -10*t + 2008;
plot(t, y, 'b')
plot([0.0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, 4.5, 5.0, 5.5, 6.0, 6.5, 7.0, 7.5, 8.0, 8.5, 9.0, 9.5, 10.0, 10.5, 11.0, 11.5, 12.0, 12.5, 13.0, 13.5, 14.0, 14.5, 15.0, 15.5, 16.0, 16.5, 17.0, 17.5, 18.0, 18.5, 19.0, 19.5, 20.0], [1997.0, 1993.0, 1988.5, 1983.75, 1978.875, 1973.9375, 1968.96875, 1963.984375, 1958.9921875, 1953.99609375, 1948.998046875, 1943.9990234375, 1938.99951171875, 1933.999755859375, 1928.9998779296875, 1923.9999389648438, 1918.9999694824219, 1913.999984741211, 1908.9999923706055, 1903.9999961853027, 1898.9999980926514, 1893.9999990463257, 1888.9999995231628, 1883.9999997615814, 1878.9999998807907, 1873.9999999403954, 1868.9999999701977, 1863.9999999850988, 1858.9999999925494, 1853.9999999962747, 1848.9999999981374, 1843.9999999990687, 1838.9999999995343, 1833.9999999997672, 1828.9999999998836, 1823.9999999999418, 1818.999999999971, 1813.9999999999854, 1808.9999999999927, 1803.9999999999964, 1798.9999999999982], 'r')
